```
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"regexp"
)

func main() {
	sampleRegex := regexp.MustCompile("(?i)abc")

	match := sampleRegex.Match([]byte("abc"))
	fmt.Printf("For abc: %t\n", match)

	match = sampleRegex.Match([]byte("ABC"))
	fmt.Printf("For ABC: %t\n", match)
}
```

```
For abc: true
For ABC: true
```

```
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"regexp"
)

func main() {
	sampleRegex := regexp.MustCompile("abc")

	match := sampleRegex.Match([]byte("abc"))
	fmt.Printf("For abc: %t\n", match)

	match = sampleRegex.Match([]byte("ABC"))
	fmt.Printf("For ABC: %t\n", match)
}
```

```
For abc: true
For ABC: false
```
